lyrics:
No More Tears (Enough Is Enough) Lyrics[Bella]
It's raining, it's pouring
My love life is boring me to tears, after all these years

[Katie]
I always dreamed I'd find the perfect lover
But he turned out to be like every other man

[Bella & Katie]
I loved
I loved

[Bella]
Heyyyy

[Katie]
Ohh, ohh, ohhhh
[Bella & Katie]
Enough is enough is enough
I can't go on, I can't go on no more no
Enough is enough is enough
I want him out, I want him out that door now

[Bella]
I always dreamed I'd found the perfect lover

[Katie]
Ooohhh
But he turned out to be like every other man

[Katie & Bella]
I lovеd (I had no choice from the start)
I loved (I'vе gotta listen to my heart)
I loved (Tearing us apart)

[Bella]
I loved, loved, looved

[Bella & Katie]
Enough is enough is enough
I can't go on, I can't go on no more no
Enough is enough is enough
I want him out, I want him out that door now
[Bella]
Nooooooo-oooo-oooo

[Katie]
No mooooooooore

[Bella & Katie]
Enough is enough is enough is enough is enoooooughEmbed
